tool_description: Extracts and structures bibliographic information from raw citation text into standardized components like author, title, journal, year, etc.

raw_citation.description: The raw citation text to be parsed

expected_type.description: Expected citation type: journal, book, website, conference, thesis

error_messages: Empty citation text: Provide non-empty citation text to parse.
Unparseable citation format: The citation format is not recognizable or too malformed to extract meaningful information.
Invalid expected type: Use one of [journal, book, website, conference, thesis, auto].
usage: Provide raw_citation text and optionally specify expected_type. The tool will extract structured bibliographic components from the citation.
